doc.str: Tagged scale inhibiting polymers, compositions comprised thereof and preventing or controlling scale formation therewith

Tagged scale-inhibiting polymers, compositions comprised thereof and preventing or controlling scale formation therewith, the tagging units being units deriving from a monomer having the formula X.sub.2C.dbd.CYY' wherein X is a hydrogen atom, or a C.sub.1-C.sub.4 alkyl radical, Y is a hydrogen atom or a C.sub.1-C.sub.4 alkyl radical, Y' is a radical having formula -L-Arom, wherein L is a covalent bond or a divalent organic linking group optionally comprising heteroatoms, and Arom is a group comprising at least two conjugated aromatic rings, said rings comprising conjugated carbon atoms, and, linked to said carbon atoms, hydrogen atoms or other substituents.
International Serach Report corresponding to PCT/EP 2004/006977, issued on Mar. 17, 2005, 2 page. cited by other. | International Search Report dated Jun. 7, 2006. cited by other .
